/**
 * Do not edit this file.  Any changes will be overwritten by the gamedata
 * updater or by upgrading your AMX Mod X install.
 *
 * To override data in this file, create a subdirectory named "custom" and
 * place your own gamedata file(s) inside of it.  Such files will be parsed
 * after AMXX's own.
 *
 * For more information, see http://wiki.alliedmods.net/Gamedata_Updating_(AMX_Mod_X)
 */

"Games"
{
	"#default"
	{
		"Classes"
		{
			"CIchthyosaur"
			{
				"Offsets"
				{
					"m_SaveVelocity"  // Vector
					{
						"type"      "vector"

						"windows"   "744"
						"linux"     "764"
						"mac"       "764"
					}

					"m_idealDist"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "756"
						"linux"     "776"
						"mac"       "776"
					}

					"m_flBlink"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "760"
						"linux"     "780"
						"mac"       "780"
					}

					"m_flEnemyTouched"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "764"
						"linux"     "784"
						"mac"       "784"
					}

					"m_bOnAttack"  // BOOL
					{
						"type"      "integer"

						"windows"   "768"
						"linux"     "788"
						"mac"       "788"
					}

					"m_flMaxSpeed"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "772"
						"linux"     "792"
						"mac"       "792"
					}

					"m_flMinSpeed"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "776"
						"linux"     "796"
						"mac"       "796"
					}

					"m_flMaxDist"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "780"
						"linux"     "800"
						"mac"       "800"
					}

					"m_pBeam"  // CBeam*
					{
						"type"      "classptr"

						"windows"   "784"
						"linux"     "804"
						"mac"       "804"
					}

					"m_flNextAlert"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "788"
						"linux"     "808"
						"mac"       "808"
					}

					"m_flLastPitchTime"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "792"
						"linux"     "812"
						"mac"       "812"
					}

					"m_flLastZYawTime"  // float
					{
						"type"      "float"

						"windows"   "796"
						"linux"     "816"
						"mac"       "816"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
